attributes.action: To hold an independently scrutinised, single question referendum on Britains continued membership of the E.U.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The E.U. has changed dramatically since the ratification of the Treaty of Rome, and since then the British people have been denied their democratic right to decide whether or not Britain should be a sovereign and independent State, governed only by a democratically elected British Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
